name: The putrid staff of the Magi (2h)
data: It increases hit chance a bit.
It has low weapon class for its type (little in general).
It decreases the users strength poorly.
It decreases the users constitution poorly.
It decreases the users wisdom impressively.
It increases the users intelligence phenomenally.
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration adequately.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'offensive efficiency'.
This item loses its magical powers incredibly slowly.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'sense weakness'.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'upper hand'.
Increases the damage disruption and death wish considerably while wielded.
